description: This content item defines the navigation structure for a site.

elements.helpText: This element contains the serialized JSON object that defines the nested navigation for the site. The individual nodes are referencing individual page content items by ID.
elements.label: Navigation

elements.helpText: This element identifies the default page for the site.
elements.label: Default Page

elements.helpText: This element is used to uniquely identify this element in the current content item
